Interface ITissue

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo
Assembly
Vts.dll

Defines a contract for Tissue classes in Monte Carlo simulation.

Properties

AbsorptionWeightingType

AbsorptionWeightingType enum specifier indicating Analog, Discrete Absorption weighting, etc.

AbsorptionWeightingType AbsorptionWeightingType { get; }

Property Value

AbsorptionWeightingType

PhaseFunctionType

PhaseFunctionType enum specifier indicating Henyey-Greenstein, Bidirectional, etc.

PhaseFunctionType PhaseFunctionType { get; }

Property Value

PhaseFunctionType

RegionScatterLengths

The scattering lengths for each tissue region. For discrete absorption weighting and analog, this is based on 1/mut, for continuous it is based on 1/mus.

IList<double> RegionScatterLengths { get; }

Property Value

IList<double>

Regions

A list of ITissueRegions that describes the entire system.

IList<ITissueRegion> Regions { get; }

Property Value

IList<ITissueRegion>

RussianRouletteWeightThreshold

photon weight threshold, below which turns on Russian Roulette

double RussianRouletteWeightThreshold { get; }

Property Value

double

GetRefractedDirection(Position, Direction, double, double, double)

Method to provide refracted direction of photon.

Direction GetRefractedDirection(Position currentPosition, Direction currentDirection, double currentN, double nextN, double cosThetaSnell)

Parameters

currentPosition Position

current position of photon

currentDirection Direction

current direction of photon

currentN double

refractive index of current tissue type

nextN double

refractive index of next tissue type

cosThetaSnell double

cos(theta) of the refracted direction according to Snell's law

Returns

Direction

refracted direction

OnDomainBoundary(Position)

Method to determine whether on tissue domain boundary. This method helps to determine when photon leaves the phase space and enters the air for example.

bool OnDomainBoundary(Position position)

position Position

Returns
